name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After this character uses a Skill: Until the end of this Round, +1 additional DMG provided by this card. (Up to +2 DMG total.)
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

storytitle: Eagle Spear of Justice: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
storytext: "The stone bird took to the unbound skies once forged. Into the heart of the ocean it dove, into the battlefield with the behemoth and the whale. Into the depths of the sea the behemoth sank, there to stay forever. Released from its thundering roars were the people of Liyue."
